org.jppf.node.event

Interface NodeLifeCycleErrorHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLifeCycleErrorHandler

    public interface NodeLifeCycleErrorHandler
    Interface for handling uncaught throwables raised when executing one of the methods of NodeLifeCycleListener.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleError(NodeLifeCycleListener listener, NodeLifeCycleEvent event, Throwable t)
      Handle the throwable raised for the specified event.

    • Method Detail

      • handleError

        void handleError(NodeLifeCycleListener listener,
               NodeLifeCycleEvent event,
               Throwable t)
        Handle the throwable raised for the specified event.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener whose method was being executed when the thowable was raised.
        event - the event notification for which an error was raised.
        t - the uncaught throwable that was raised during the notification.
